WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
I use: $objPHPExcelWrite->setFormatCode(PHPExcel_Style_NumberFormat::FORMAT_DATE_YYYYMMDDSLASH);
for format the date in excel (Read from Excel Date/Time.  However, when I open the file, I saw only 01/12/31.

How can I make it show 4 digit to year???

By the way, how can I handle the year before 1900 such as 1890???

Thanks

Atkins
